title: Everything is Bullshit: The Greatest Scams on Earth Revealed
description:
Everything is Bullshit: The Greatest Scams on Earth Revealed - Alex Mayyasi, Rohin Dhar, Zachary Crockett [epub]

Many of our societyâ€™s most cherished traditions are actually based on historical accident, the proï¬t motives of a few companies, or the agenda of someone who died long ago. A lot of what we believe and do is bullshit, yet we walk around thinking our way of doing things is inherently correct. Why do we exchange diamond engagement rings? Why is wine so expensive? How does art become â€œartâ€? Why do so many non-proï¬ts want us to donate cars to them? Why does college cost so much? Why do so many pets die in animal shelters? Why is the world the way it is? Everything is Bullshit, by Priceonomics, is an investigation to ï¬nd the answers
